name: Death in the Dungeon
description:
Death in the Dungeon.

The game was made for AlexMile GameJam in 4 days

Relevance to the topic: In games, you usually need to survive and it is better not to get caught by enemies. And our hero, on the contrary, wants to find a monster in order to die. And can drive platforms that break the laws of physics.

You are a fox who did the opposite from birth. And then one day you got bored with living and you decided to die. You have gone to a lost dungeon. In which one monster is rumored to live.

Controls:

  • RightArrow - Right
  • LeftArrow - Left
  • UpArrow - Jump
